_schema.description: Location definitions for scene generation. Claude Code populates this from your source material.
_schema.variant_pattern: Use dot notation for variants: ThroneRoom, ThroneRoom.Ruined, ThroneRoom.Decorated
notes: Each location needs atmosphere and lighting details for consistent scenes
Be specific about lighting sources - they dramatically affect mood
Variants: Use dot notation for different states of the same location
Each variant is a complete, standalone entry - not a partial override

ExampleVillage.name: Example Village
ExampleVillage.full_description: A peaceful mountain village with thatched-roof cottages clustered around a central well. Smoke rises from chimneys. Surrounded by pine forests with snow-capped peaks in the distance.

description_components.architecture: Thatched-roof stone cottages with wooden shutters. Cobblestone paths between buildings. Central stone well with wooden roof.
description_components.atmosphere: Peaceful and welcoming. Quiet rural life. Smell of wood smoke and fresh bread.
description_components.lighting: Warm morning sunlight filtering through mountain mist. Long shadows from the eastern peaks.
description_components.key_features: Central well, small tavern with hanging sign, blacksmith's forge with glowing coals.

ExampleVillage.Attacked.name: Example Village (Under Attack)
ExampleVillage.Attacked.full_description: The same peaceful mountain village, now in chaos. Thatched roofs burning, smoke billowing. Villagers fleeing. The central well area is a battleground.

description_components.architecture: Same cottages, but some roofs ablaze. Doors broken open. Cobblestone paths littered with debris. Central well overturned.
description_components.atmosphere: Chaotic and terrifying. Screams and crackling fire. Acrid smoke fills the air.
description_components.lighting: Orange firelight flickering against night sky. Dancing shadows. Embers floating upward.
description_components.key_features: Burning buildings, fleeing villagers, overturned carts, broken weapons on the ground.

ExampleDungeon.name: Example Dungeon
ExampleDungeon.full_description: Ancient stone corridors lit by flickering torches. Moss grows on damp walls. Distant echoes of dripping water. Carved runes glow faintly on archways.

description_components.architecture: Massive stone blocks forming corridors and chambers. Carved archways with ancient runes. Worn stone steps descending into darkness.
description_components.atmosphere: Oppressive and mysterious. Ancient secrets hidden in shadows. Air is cool and damp.
description_components.lighting: Flickering orange torchlight creating dancing shadows. Faint blue glow from magical runes. Darkness beyond the light's reach.
description_components.key_features: Glowing rune-carved archways, iron torch sconces, moss-covered walls, distant echoing drips.
